content:
Note: The Arcadia project ended in 1997. This web site is for archival purposes; we can no longer guarantee liveness of links.

The Arcadia Consortium

The Arcadia project is organized as an informal consortium of separately funded researchers. These include the following academic institutions and principal investigators:

Arcadia at University of California, Irvine (UCI)

Debra J. Richardson (djr@ics.uci.edu)
Testing, Analysis
Richard W. Selby (selby@ics.uci.edu)
Measurement and Evaluation
Richard N. Taylor (taylor@ics.uci.edu)
Software Architecture, User Interface Software, Team-Support Software, and Hypermedia

Arcadia at University of Colorado at Boulder (CU)

Dennis Heimbigner (dennis@cs.colorado.edu)
Object Management, Process, Architecture
Roger King (roger@cs.colorado.edu)
Object Management
Alexander L. Wolf (alw@cs.colorado.edu)
Process, Analysis, Language Issues, Architecture

Arcadia at University of Massachusetts at Amherst (UMass)

Lori A. Clarke (clarke@cs.umass.edu)
Object Management, Language Processing, Analysis
Leon J. Osterweil (ljo@cs.umass.edu)
Process, Architecture

Arcadia at Purdue University

Michal Young (young@cs.purdue.edu)
Analysis
The Arcadia Project <arcadia-www@ics.uci.edu>
Last modified: Wed Mar 8 9:47:52 1995
